developer_first.title: Developer First
developer_first.description: We build for developers, by developers. Every decision is made with the developer experience in mind.

remote_culture.title: Remote Culture
remote_culture.description: Distributed team across 15+ countries. We believe great talent exists everywhere and embrace async collaboration.

open_source.title: Open Source
open_source.description: Contributing back to the community that made us possible. Open source is in our DNA.

continuous_learning.title: Continuous Learning
continuous_learning.description: Technology evolves fast, and so do we. We invest in our team's growth and encourage experimentation.
